title: Topographic Map Understanding Education Using Augmented Reality

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Social studies curriculum utilizing augmented reality sandboxes for experiential learning in limited technological environments (primarily smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can interpret contour lines and visually explain elevation changes in a 3D augmented reality environment
Using an AR sandbox, learners can analyze slope gradient, aspect, and divide directions of actual terrain with 80% accuracy
Learners enhance their ability to conceptually map spatial-perceptual relationships of topographic maps through multimodal feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
